body_html: @beniroquai Are you using tensorflow/contrib/android/jni/jni_utils.cc? If so, it's strange that the the filesize check in isn't catching this and picking the correct path. Would you mind adding LOG(INFO) << "fd: " << fd << ", length: " << length; directly after fd is initialized and reporting what it says?

body: @beniroquai Are you using tensorflow/contrib/android/jni/jni_utils.cc? If so, it's strange that the the filesize check in isn't catching this and picking the correct path. Would you mind adding   `LOG(INFO) <<  "fd: " << fd << ", length: " << length;` directly after fd is initialized and reporting what it says?
